text: "Vertigo" is a 2004 song by Irish rock group U2 and is the leading single from their 11th studio album How to Dismantle an Atomic Bomb. It topped the single charts in the United Kingdom, Ireland, Spain, Italy, Denmark, Greece, Scotland and made the top 10 in New Zealand, the Netherlands, Finland, Australia, Canada, Belgium, Switzerland, Norway, Austria and Sweden. It won 3 Grammy Awards in 2005. In 2011 Bon Jovi covered Vertigo in a snippet of Bad Medicine on their Bon Jovi Live tour. ==Formats and track listings== ===7-inch and 12-inch vinyl singles=== ===CD and DVD singles=== ==References== Category:2004 songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:U2 songs Category:Bon Jovi songs
title: Vertigo (U2 song)
